content: {"name": "Church of the Pilgrims - Open Table", "alternate_name": "", "description": "  Lunch is served in the garden on 23rd Street NW, behind the sanctuary.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.churchofthepilgrims.org/blog", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2201 P Street Northwest", "address_2": null, "city": "Northwest Washington", "state_province": "DC", "postal_code": "20037", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 38.9103895, "longitude": -77.04951059999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(202) 387-6612", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Sunday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "17:30"}]}
